orgs: hire an oss strategy person to do this for your entire product portfolio. add in ‚Äúwhat does the project need‚Äù to the ‚Äúhow is this being funded?‚Äù question 
eng: do this for your tech stack

content.html: This may seem like overkill, but it's really an investment in your company's stability. #OpenSource may reduce many costs of development, but it's not entirely free. Don't find out that the library that's integral to your infrastructure is un(der)-funded when it's too late.
content.value:
This may seem like overkill, but it's really an investment in your company's stability. #OpenSource may reduce many costs of development, but it's not entirely free.

Don't find out that the library that's integral to your infrastructure is un(der)-funded when it's too late.
